channel.title: Need Help Banning
channel.description:
Use to referr to a Tut for this but now I have no Idea... I want to ban a name, I never mastered the power to ban because I don't need it very much :P
Anyone want to give me a link to a tut or explain how to ban, (username ban is alright for me)
Thanks![br][size=1]Posted at: October 29, 2006, 05:32:38 PM[/size][hr]Come On... Someone? I need to IP Ban. -.-
